data.actual_result: Discord detects "on" from "von" as a filter and puts a space after the letter v
data.expected_result: search history should stay the same no matter the language you change to
data.short_description: using the search filter `von` in German then changing the language to English adds a space after v in search history
data.steps_to_repro: - click on the search bar and start a search - type (von:) which means from to filter by user - select a random user then start a search for it to save in history - go to language settings and change the language back to English - open the search bar and observe - (this can be done with other filters/languages if the older language contains filters from the new one just like "von" contains "on")
